arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Eric Roy is blunt: “We didn’t have what it took.”
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain and Brest faced off this Saturday at Stade Francis Le Blé in the ninth round of Ligue 1 2025-2026. The match ended in a 3-0 victory for Paris. After the match, Brest coach Eric Roy spoke to beIN SPORTS. Roy: “There were also a few small mistakes, even though we played the game […]

arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Hakimi, Zaire-Emery, and VAR…the highs and lows!
arts.sum: On Saturday evening, Paris Saint-Germain won 0-3 against Brest in the ninth round of Ligue 1 2025-2026 at the Stade Francis Le-Blé. Here are the highs and lows of this victory. Highs – Achraf Hakimi. Of course, a defender’s job is first and foremost to defend. The 26-year-old right back did that rather well. But […]

arts.ttl: Hakimi scores twice as PSG beats Brest 3-0 to go top of Ligue 1
arts.sum: Hakimi, a rock-solid right-back who also scored in the Champions League final last season, put PSG in front in the 29th minute with a right-footed volley from Vitinha’s clever pass over the defense. Achraf Hakimi’s great attacking flair was on display Saturday as the Morocco defender’s two goals led Paris Saint-Germain to a 3-0 win at Brest, moving it one point clear of Lens at the top of Ligue 1.

arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Chevalier recounts his match and laments the slowness of VAR
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 3-0 against Brest on Saturday at the Stade Francis Le Blé in the ninth round of Ligue 1 2025-2026. After the match, Parisian goalkeeper Lucas Chevalier (23) spoke to beIN SPORTS. Chevalier: “We must always be on the lookout.” Was it a quiet evening or not? We have similar evenings as Parisian […]

arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Hakimi has strong words about the victory and the African Ballon d’Or
arts.sum: Achraf Hakimi, Paris Saint-Germain’s 26-year-old right back, spoke to beIN SPORTS after Paris’ 3-0 win over Brest on Saturday at the Stade Francis Le Blé in the ninth round of Ligue 1 2025-2026. Hakimi: “The coach’s philosophy suits me very well.” Man of the match with two goals and a lot of effort. Is this […]

arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Luis Enrique highlights what he particularly liked
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 3-0 against Brest on Saturday at the Stade Francis Le Blé in the ninth round of Ligue 1 2025-2026. After the match, Paris coach Luis Enrique spoke to beIN SPORTS. Luis Enrique: “We defended differently, I’m happy with the win.” How did you feel during the seven-minute wait for the penalty? That’s […]

arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Parisian player ratings: Hakimi and Vitinha led the way
arts.sum: This Saturday, on the ninth matchday of Ligue 1 2025-2026, Paris Saint-Germain faced Brest at the Stade Francis Le-Blé. After a match in which Les Rouge et Bleu controlled proceedings with ease, they won 3-0. Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (5) – He didn’t exude great confidence in his […]

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Brest 0-3 PSG: Ligue 1 champions provisionally go back on top
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Matchday 9, 25/10/25 PSG have provisionally clawed back to the top of Ligue 1 before Marseille’s away game at Lens tonight. Achraf Hakimi opened his Ligue 1…

arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Live coverage of the Parisians’ pre-match
arts.sum: This Saturday, as part of Matchday 9 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, second-place Paris Saint-Germain will face 12th-place Brest at the Parc des Princes. With kickoff at 5 p.m. CET, the club is offering a live pre-match coverage of the players’ warm-ups starting at 3:45 p.m. Watch the live stream here:

arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Official lineups: Doué and Dembélé on the bench
arts.sum: This Saturday at the Stade Francis Le-Blé, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will face Brest (12th) in Matchday 9 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 5 p.m., CET).
